markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deity's Protection](/Feats.aspx?ID=4687) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Advanced Domain](/Feats.aspx?ID=4666)

</column>

---

When you call upon your deity’s power to fulfill the promise of their domain, you gain divine protection. After you cast a domain spell, you gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn. The amount of resistance is equal to the rank of the domain spell you cast.
name: Deity's Protection
